channel.title: I realy need help please
channel.description:
i get this error when i made me web client :
java.lang.NullPointerException at client.cleanUpForQuit(client.java:5971) at RSApplet.exit(RSApplet.java:132) at RSApplet.destroy(RSApplet.java:174) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Exception in thread "Thread-13" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.showErrorScreen(client.java:9076) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10295) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:5753) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Error: loaderror Starting up 31
How do i fix this replay please or add me : justhin10@hotmaill.com

item.title: I realy need help please
